page.title: 09GREEN LANES
page.content: Our squares are covered with a net work of Green lanes most of which are bridle paths, but some have been cleared and put into use after many years. The lanes are unpaved, very narrow and have plants that almost meet in the middle.They are very hot to walk along because there are high banks on each side. We worked out that the hedges where about 900 years old so were probably growing at the time of the first Domesday book. Shrubs and bushes include beech,sycamore,hawthorn ,dogrose ,holly ,hazel,sloe,oak,elder and wild flowers,red campion,herb robert,foxglove,penny wort,black berry,cranes bill,goose grass,harts toungue fern,purple and yellow vetch,yellow dead nettle,speed well, ,marsh marigold,celandine ,primrose, dandilion,bluebell,daisy,white & purple violets,ramsons,stitchwort.
